rules.natural: If the survivor gets sick, then it is not the case that the survivor drinks unpurified water.

Either the survivor sees a bear, or the survivor sees a wolf.
If the survivor avoids dangerous water, then if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, the survivor does not drink unpurified water.
Either the survivor avoids dangerous water, or the survivor tests water quality.
If the survivor tests water quality, then the survivor observes an animal drinking.

If the survivor checks for signs, then if the survivor observes an animal drinking, then if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, the survivor does not drink unpurified water.
Either the survivor checks for signs, or the survivor follows animal tracks.

Whenever the survivor has safe water, either the survivor uses a filter, or the survivor boils water.

If the survivor recognizes contamination, then if it is not the case that having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water, the survivor does not drink unpurified water.
If the survivor sees an algae bloom, then it is not the case that the survivor smells chemicals.
Whenever the survivor inspects water closely, if the survivor sees an algae bloom, then the survivor smells chemicals.
Either the survivor inspects water closely, or the survivor tests with a kit.
If the survivor ignores warnings, then the survivor drinks anyway.

Either the survivor signals rescue, or if it is not the case that not having purification tablets implies the survivor has clean water leads to the survivor needing medical help, then the survivor does not find help.
